verses.name: Habakkuk 2:13
verses.text: Behold, is it not of the Lord of hosts that the people shall labour in the very fire, and the people shall weary themselves for very vanity?

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:14
verses.text: For the earth shall be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

verses.name: Habakkuk 2:15
verses.text: Woe unto him that giveth his neighbour drink, that puttest thy bottle to him, and makest him drunken also, that thou mayest look on their nakedness!
